comment.body: @P2P: Don't think too much, it has not relation to this.ZeroNet just an idea now, maybe TED thinks it is not a good thing for people.oneday ,ZeroNet can change people's life, TED will invite nofish to give a speech again, but I don't think TED is the better place to introduce ZeroNet.
It is better than China.At less Rusian can use google youtube FB twitter and so on.We can NOT use google server without VPN.
Russia and the United States are expected to war in Syria.

@Nofish: It is difference in different country,in China people sell the router which has VPN fuction also [be arrested](http://info.3g.qq.com/g/s?sid=&aid=gd_ss&id=gd_20161213025114) by the police.People privately built VPN is also will [be fined](http://3g.china.com/act/news/11184589/20170123/30204899.html).Maybe it is much more freedom in European countries.

PS: Sorry,the link is in Chinese.
So big, but just a few Chinese songs, still HongKong songs..
Still can't download any books, so sad. [zeropub](/zeropub.bit) is better than this now.
It seems that Russia is much badly than China.
@Lmath: I think Russia will build a Great Fire Wall like China in the near future.
@12hlearn: p2p website is free speech's future.busines site can't use p2p site
Welcome back :) These days so many Chinese have joined in ZeroNet. It is good news for ZN :)
